IRPact_modellierung.agents

Class SpatialInformationAgent

  • java.lang.Object
    • IRPact_modellierung.SimulationEntity
      • IRPact_modellierung.agents.Agent
        • IRPact_modellierung.agents.SpatialAgent
          • IRPact_modellierung.agents.SpatialInformationAgent
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ConsumerAgent, POSAgent

    public class SpatialInformationAgent
extends SpatialAgent
    A SpatialInformationAgent brings together the spatiality of a SpatialAgent as well as the informational nature of an InformationAgent, through having associated with it an informationAuthority representing the credibility of the information stemming from this agent.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class IRPact_modellierung.SimulationEntity

        associatedSimulationContainer

      Constructor and Description
      SpatialInformationAgent(SimulationContainer simulationContainer, java.awt.geom.Point2D coordinates, double informationAuthority)
      An information agent is an agent within the simulation that can create information, and is spatially situated.

    • Constructor Detail

      • SpatialInformationAgent

        public SpatialInformationAgent(SimulationContainer simulationContainer,
                               java.awt.geom.Point2D coordinates,
                               double informationAuthority)
        An information agent is an agent within the simulation that can create information, and is spatially situated. Associated with it it has an informationAuthority representing the credibility of the information stemming from this agent.
        Parameters:
        simulationContainer - The container the simulation runs in
        coordinates - The spatial position the spatial agent is initialized with
        informationAuthority - The authority information stemming from this agent has
